summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of the south 150 feet of the north 330 feet of the north one-half of the northeast quarter of the southwest quarter of the southeast quarter of Section 29-26-4, less the east 156 feet and less the west 30 feet thereof; together with the south 30 feet of the north 330 feet of the west 126 feet of the east 156 feet of the north one-half of the northeast quarter of the southwest quarter of the southeast quarter of Section 29-26-4; with respect to Use Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended by adding thereto one new section numbered 2-350.
